hero.headline: Pack clever. Travel calm.
hero.description: SmartPack builds your perfect packing list in seconds – tailored to destination, weather, activities, and your personal travel style. Never forget something essential again.
points: Personalised packing lists for every trip
Offline ready and synced across devices

features.headline: Total control of every detail – zero stress
features.description: SmartPack blends intelligent capabilities into one seamless experience. From planning to the final reminder – all in one app.

items.title: AI-powered suggestions
items.description: Get curated packing advice that respects your destination, local weather, and cultural nuances.

items.title: Smart packing cubes
items.description: Visualise every piece of luggage and optimise volume and weight with automated cube and case guidance.

items.title: Offline & in sync
items.description: Use SmartPack offline on the road. Progress and checklists stay synchronised across all devices.

items.title: Safety first
items.description: Dedicated checklists for documents, visas, and insurance – with reminders for deadlines and expiries.

items.title: Geo intelligence
items.description: Real-time data on climate, events, and seasonal requirements for every region worldwide.

items.title: Travel as a crew
items.description: Share lists, assign tasks, and keep every teammate on top of the essentials.

process.headline: From inspiration to boarding in four steps
process.description: A setup that makes complex journeys simple. Business trip, world tour, or family holiday – SmartPack guides you end to end.

steps.title: Share your trip
steps.description: Select destination, duration, fellow travellers, and special requirements – multiple stops welcome.

steps.title: Fine-tune smartly
steps.description: Receive tailored clothing, gear, and document suggestions based on weather data and expert insights.

steps.title: Sync your lists
steps.description: Tick items across devices, prioritise categories, and set reminders for upcoming deadlines.

steps.title: Onboard the crew
steps.description: Invite fellow travellers, assign responsibilities, and pack together in real time.

metrics.headline: Numbers that earn trust
metrics.description: SmartPack evolves with a global community of frequent flyers, globetrotters, and travel creators. Our data foundation grows with every journey.

quote.text: SmartPack saved our remote team. Every offsite now feels like we hired a personal travel concierge.
quote.author: Leonie · Chief of Staff

testimonials.headline: Journeys that stay with you
testimonials.description: SmartPack already powers thousands of trips – from micro adventures to expeditions. Our community tells the story best.

items.quote: SmartPack is my go-to tool for every on-location shoot. No spreadsheets, no chaos emails – we pack systematically and miss nothing.
items.author: Marius · Creative Producer

items.quote: Weather insights, family profiles, and reminders for kid essentials are invaluable. Travelling with three kids without stress is suddenly real.
items.author: Franziska · Family Travel Creator

items.quote: I spent six months travelling the world – SmartPack was with me daily. The offline mode in remote regions was a total game changer.
items.author: Luca · Digital Nomad

faq.headline: Answers to your key questions
faq.description: Still unsure? We co-build SmartPack with you. Reach out anytime and join the beta community.

items.question: Can I use SmartPack without internet?
items.answer: Yes. Your checklists are cached locally. As soon as you're back online we sync with your account so everything stays current.

items.question: How personalised are the packing lists?
items.answer: We blend your inputs on destination, time frame, activities, and travel style with weather data, community knowledge, and expert experience.

items.question: Which devices are supported?
items.answer: SmartPack is a Progressive Web App. Install it on iOS, Android, macOS, Windows, and Linux – the experience stays consistent everywhere.

cta.headline: Get your beta access
cta.description: Install SmartPack as a PWA, be first to receive new feature drops, and help shape the future of travel. We'll send your invite within minutes.
cta.success: Thank you! Your invitation is on its way to your inbox.
cta.footnote: GDPR compliant · No spam · Beta magazine included

checklist.title: Today in your flow
items: Pack passport
Adapters & chargers
Check vaccination record
Activate travel insurance

hero.headline: Meet the crew behind the packs
hero.intro: We build SmartPack as a boutique travel lab. Four humans, one shared obsession: make packing effortless for explorers everywhere.
hero.description: We split our week between co-creating with travelers, prototyping with our beta community, and pressure-testing new features on real trips.

snapshot.title: Team snapshot
items: 5 languages spoken daily and counting
Quarterly field trips to stress-test the product IRL
We catalogue every packing fail so you never repeat it

culture.headline: The rituals that keep us in flow
culture.subheadline: We work remote-first with deep focus blocks and intentional in-person jams. The more we travel, the better SmartPack becomes.
rituals: Monday postcards: async video updates recorded from wherever we are in the world.
Design lab Wednesdays where Catalina and Marcus remix fresh travel inspiration into the product system.
Friday teardown of our favourite travel tools and gear hacks from the community.
Monthly immersion trip to shadow travelers and collect new packing heuristics.

stats.label: Time zones bridged
stats.detail: We collaborate across Europe, South America, and Asia partners.

stats.label: Beta testers
stats.detail: Frequent travelers feeding us feedback every week.

stats.label: Average luggage saved
stats.detail: Per trip after switching to SmartPack workflows.

quote.text: We treat packing like a design system—iterative, collaborative, and full of tiny moments of delight.
quote.author: Catalina – Head of Product Experience

members.name: Catalina
members.bio: Leads discovery, synthesises customer stories, and turns them into intuitive flows that feel like a travel concierge in your pocket.
members.funFact: Keeps a color-coded archive of ticket stubs that inspires SmartPack’s seasonal palettes.
members.photoAlt: Catalina smiling with sketchbook in hand

members.name: Marcus
members.bio: Crafts the visual language, motion cues, and tactile UI moments so every checklist feels calm and cinematic.
members.funFact: Collects vintage luggage tags and recreates them as limited-edition wallpapers for beta members.
members.photoAlt: Marcus reviewing motion frames on his tablet

members.name: Jonas
members.bio: Owns the technical roadmap, stitches together AI recommendations, and keeps the PWA blazing fast online and offline.
members.funFact: Documents Wi-Fi speeds from co-working spaces around the globe—yes, there’s a leaderboard.
members.photoAlt: Jonas coding from a bright coworking space

members.name: Simon
members.bio: Runs our go-to-market ops, community partnerships, and keeps the whole crew aligned on the SmartPack mission.
members.funFact: Can pack a 10-day trip in under 20 minutes and invented our ‘two-zipper rule’.

hero.headline: We’re currently not hiring—but the journey continues
hero.description: Our compact crew is fully staffed right now. We’re using this season to ship core product experiences and nurture our beta community.

status.title: Current status
status.message: No open roles for 2025. We expect the next hiring wave in early 2026.

hero.followUp: Want to hear when things change? We share updates via our newsletter and personal replies to thoughtful introductions.

items.title: Travel-first research
items.description: Every feature ships with insights gathered on real trips—train tables, mountain huts, and airport floors included.

items.title: Craft over speed
items.description: We care about details that make packing joyful, even if it means iterating longer with our beta community.

items.title: Radical transparency
items.description: We share roadmaps, learnings, and experiments openly with users and future teammates.

perks.headline: What teammates love when positions open
perks.description: SmartPack is still boutique, so we shape benefits together. These are the staples people stay for.

items.title: Global remote setup
items.description: Work from anywhere within ±2h CET. We sponsor coworking passes and slow-travel residencies twice per year.

items.title: Annual field expeditions
items.description: Join research trips to test SmartPack in new climates while collecting stories for the community.

items.title: Creative growth budget
items.description: €1,500 per year for courses, mentors, or gear that expands your craft and curiosity.

items.title: Wellbeing by design
items.description: Four-day focused work cycles, async deep-work blocks, and dedicated recharge weeks after each launch.

keepInTouch.title: Stay in the loop
keepInTouch.description: Subscribers get quarterly product notes, early beta invites, and the first word when we reopen roles.

future.title: Building your future seat
future.message: Tell us who you are, what you’d love to build, and the kind of adventure you want at SmartPack. We’ll reach out when the timing is right.

footer.headline: Travel perfected.
footer.description: SmartPack is your intelligent travel assistant. We craft tools that support you before, during, and after every journey.

hero.headline: We’re travellers building for travellers
hero.intro: Questions, partnership ideas, feature requests or media enquiries – reach the crew directly and we’ll get back within 48 hours.
hero.description: Pick a channel that fits your request. We route every message to the teammate best suited to respond.

slots.title: How we respond
items: Average response time: under 48 hours on weekdays
We reply in English or German (FR/IT coming soon)
Press requests receive dedicated media kits

channels.label: Support & Feedback
channels.description: Running into friction or have an idea? Our product triage keeps SmartPack’s roadmap aligned with traveller needs.

channels.label: Partnerships
channels.description: For travel brands, creators, or gear makers who want to collaborate on smart packing experiences.

channels.label: Media & Press
channels.description: Need a quote, press kit, or interview? Reach Simon directly for media coordination.

faq.title: Contact FAQ
faq.description: Popular questions from our community and partners.

items.question: How fast do you reply?
items.answer: During the week we aim for < 48h. For urgent issues mention 'urgent' in the subject line.

items.question: Do you offer live demos?
items.answer: Yes – once a month we host a community session. Drop us a note and we’ll share the next date.

items.question: Can I pitch a feature idea?
items.answer: Absolutely. Share context about your trip and pain point so we can explore it in discovery.

hero.title: How SmartPack protects your data
hero.intro: We build packing tools that respect your privacy. This policy explains the data we collect, how we use it, and the safeguards in place for travellers and teams.
hero.location: SmartPack operates from Switzerland and complies with the DSGVO (EU GDPR) requirements for data protection.

privacyPage.aiNotice: SmartPack uses AI running on our own infrastructure to generate packing lists. Your personal information never leaves SmartPack or our servers, is anonymized for processing, and is never shared with third-party systems.

summary.title: At a glance
items: We only collect the data needed to provide SmartPack and tailor packing recommendations.
You stay in control: export or delete your profile and trips at any time from Settings.
We never sell your personal information and only share data with trusted subprocessors needed to run the service.

sections.title: Information we collect
sections.description: We gather information you choose to share with us so SmartPack can personalise your experience.

items.label: Account details
items.text: Email address, name, preferred language, and authentication identifiers from your chosen sign-in provider.

items.label: Trip data
items.text: Itineraries, destinations, companions, packing preferences, and any custom items you add to SmartPack.

items.label: Usage insights
items.text: Device type, app interactions, and diagnostic events that help us understand performance issues and improve features.

sections.title: How we use your data
sections.description: We process your information to operate SmartPack and deliver relevant packing assistance.

items.label: Deliver the service
items.text: Authenticate you, sync your trips, and keep your packing lists available across devices.

items.label: Improve SmartPack
items.text: Analyse aggregated product usage to prioritise features, fix bugs, and refine packing suggestions.

items.label: AI-powered packing suggestions
items.text: Generate packing tips using SmartPack AI models that run on anonymized inputs stored on our own servers; personal data never leaves SmartPack or reaches third-party systems.

items.label: Support and communication
items.text: Respond to your requests, send essential operational emails, and share optional product updates you can opt out of at any time.

sections.title: Subprocessors and sharing
sections.description: We rely on a short list of partners to host infrastructure, run analytics, or provide support tooling. Each partner agrees to strict data protection terms.

items.label: Infrastructure
items.text: Cloud hosting, storage, and content delivery providers that keep SmartPack fast and reliable.

items.label: Analytics
items.text: Product analytics that help us measure usage trends without selling or renting personal data.

items.label: Support tooling
items.text: Helpdesk and messaging tools we use to answer your questions.

sections.footnote: A current list of subprocessors is available on request via privacy@smartpack.app.

sections.title: Data retention and deletion
sections.description: We keep your information only as long as you maintain a SmartPack account or as required by law.
paragraphs: Delete a trip or your entire account from the Settings page to remove associated data from our active systems.
Backups are purged on a rolling schedule. When you cancel an account we anonymise or delete remaining data within 60 days.

sections.title: International transfers
sections.description: SmartPack operates from Switzerland under the DSGVO (EU GDPR). When data moves to other jurisdictions we rely on standard contractual clauses or equivalent safeguards.

rights.title: Your privacy rights
rights.intro: Because SmartPack operates from Switzerland under the DSGVO (EU GDPR), you may have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your personal data.
items: Access and receive a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
Update inaccurate information or complete incomplete records.
Request deletion of your account or limit how we use your data.
Withdraw consent or object to processing, including for marketing messages.
rights.howTo: You can exercise these rights in-app under Settings > Privacy, or by emailing privacy@smartpack.app.

contact.title: Questions or requests?
contact.description: Reach the SmartPack privacy team directly and we will respond within two business days.

hero.title: General Terms and Conditions for SmartPack
hero.intro: These Terms set out the legal agreement between you and SmartPack GmbH when you access our packing assistant across the web, desktop, or mobile experiences.
hero.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction: Zürich, Switzerland. This agreement is governed by Swiss substantive law.

summary.title: Before you use SmartPack
items: These Terms apply to every SmartPack account, including individual subscriptions and team workspaces.
Certain features may require a paid subscription. Fees are charged according to the plan you activate or order.
If you violate these Terms we may suspend or terminate your access to protect other travellers and our service.

sections.title: 1. Parties and scope
sections.description: SmartPack GmbH provides the SmartPack application and related services described on smartpack.app.
paragraphs: By creating an account or otherwise using SmartPack you agree to these Terms as an individual or on behalf of the organisation you represent.
If you use SmartPack for a company or team you confirm that you have authority to bind that entity to this agreement.

sections.title: 2. Accounts and eligibility
sections.description: To keep SmartPack secure we require accurate information and responsible use of every account.

items.label: Minimum age
items.text: You must be at least 16 years old or the age of digital consent in your jurisdiction to create a SmartPack account.

items.label: Accurate profile
items.text: Provide correct contact and billing information and update it when your circumstances change so we can deliver the service.

items.label: Team workspaces
items.text: Workspace owners and administrators are responsible for inviting members, managing access, and ensuring each user complies with these Terms.

sections.title: 3. Subscriptions and billing
sections.description: Some SmartPack capabilities may be offered through paid subscription plans.

items.label: Fees
items.text: Plan prices and included services are displayed at checkout or in the relevant order form and may change with reasonable notice.

items.label: Renewal
items.text: Unless otherwise stated, subscriptions renew automatically for successive terms unless cancelled before the current billing period ends.

items.label: Refund policy
items.text: Unless required by law, fees already paid are non-refundable and remain due until the end of the applicable billing cycle.

sections.note: Where mandatory consumer protections apply, they take precedence over the provisions in this section.

sections.title: 4. Acceptable use
sections.description: SmartPack is intended to plan trips and coordinate packing lists. You agree not to misuse the service.
paragraphs: Do not attempt to access or interfere with accounts or data that do not belong to you, nor reverse engineer, probe, or disrupt SmartPack's infrastructure.
You may not upload unlawful, infringing, or harmful content, send spam, or use SmartPack to harass other travellers or organisations.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual property
sections.description: We protect our brand and technology while respecting ownership of the content you add to SmartPack.
paragraphs: SmartPack, including the software, design, and trademarks, remains the exclusive property of SmartPack GmbH or its licensors.
You retain rights to the content you submit and grant SmartPack a limited licence to host, process, and display that content solely to operate and improve the service.

sections.title: 6. Warranty disclaimer and limitation of liability
sections.description: We aim to deliver a reliable service but some matters are outside of our control.
paragraphs: SmartPack is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis without warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, SmartPack GmbH is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our aggregate liability for any claim is limited to the fees you paid in the twelve months preceding the event giving rise to the claim.

sections.title: 7. Termination and changes
sections.description: Both you and SmartPack may end the relationship when necessary.
paragraphs: You may cancel your account at any time from the Settings page. Unless stated otherwise in your plan, cancellations take effect at the end of the current billing period.

We may suspend or terminate access if you breach these Terms, if required by law, or to protect the service. Material changes to these Terms will be communicated in-app or by email at least 30 days before they take effect.

contact.title: Need a signed agreement?
contact.description: Talk with the SmartPack legal team to request a signed copy, data processing terms, or custom provisions.
